meanings.definition: The coldest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from December to February and in the southern hemisphere from June to August.
meanings.sent1: During the winters, we enjoy building snowmen and having snowball fights.
meanings.sent2: I love wearing cozy sweaters and drinking hot cocoa during the winters.
meanings.sent3: The penguins in the zoo seem to be having a fun time during the winters.
meanings.sent4: The world seems to sleep under a blanket of white during the winters.
meanings.sent5: The winters paint the landscape in shades of blue and white, creating a serene atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To spend the winter in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: We plan to winters in the mountains this year to enjoy skiing.
meanings.sent2: Many birds winters in warmer regions to escape the cold.
meanings.sent3: Let's winters in a cozy cabin and watch movies all day.
meanings.sent4: The bears winters in caves to hibernate and stay warm.
meanings.sent5: I wish to winters in a tropical paradise to escape the snow and ice.

meanings.definition: To keep or feed animals during the winter.
meanings.sent1: Farmers winters their livestock by providing extra hay and shelter.
meanings.sent2: It's important to winters the birds by putting out bird feeders in the cold months.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers winters the animals by adjusting their diets for the colder season.
meanings.sent4: The wildlife sanctuary winters the rescued animals with care and warmth.
meanings.sent5: We must winters our pets by ensuring they have a cozy bed and enough food during the cold months.
